      byte[] getByteTextureData(byte[] data)
      byte[] px_byte = Fluid.getByteTextureData(Fluid.tex_obstacleC.src, null); PGraphics2D pg_tmp = (PGraphics2D) createGraphics(Fluid.fluid_w, Fluid.fluid_h, P2D); pg_tmp.loadPixels(); for(int i = 0; i < pg_tmp.pixels.length; i++){ int O = (int)(px_byte[i]); pg_tmp.pixels[i] = O << 24 | O << 16 | O << 8 | O; } pg_tmp.updatePixels();
